price: 66. Wonna hinnak, nabiyow Yalla uqbud qibaadá kaah caglisak. kaadu Kay niqmatal kaa faatita marih num tik!
arabic: بَلِ ٱللَّهَ فَٱعۡبُدۡ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلشَّٰكِرِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: bali al-laha fa-uʿ'bud wakun mina al-shākirīna
